messages.content: ComfyUI Hallo is an unofficial support for Hallo in ComfyUI, which allows users to generate talking face videos from images.
How can I install ComfyUI Hallo?

You can install ComfyUI Hallo from ComfyUI Manager by searching for 'hallo' and ensuring that 'ffmpeg' is installed. Alternatively, you can download or clone the repository into the ComfyUI/custom_nodes/ directory and run the provided installation commands.
What are the important updates for ComfyUI Hallo?
The important updates for ComfyUI Hallo include adding support to ComfyUI's official AudioLoad Node on 2024/07/30 and adding ComfyUI nodes and workflow examples on 2024/06/26.
Where can I find an example workflow for ComfyUI Hallo?
You can find an example workflow for ComfyUI Hallo in the provided link (examples/hallo_comfyui_basic.json), which demonstrates how to create a talking face video from an image.
Do I need to download checkpoints for ComfyUI Hallo?
No, you don't need to download checkpoints for ComfyUI Hallo. All models will be downloaded automatically to ComfyUI's model folder.
What is the purpose of the example workflow in ComfyUI Hallo?
The purpose of the example workflow in ComfyUI Hallo is to show users how to use the nodes and create a talking face video from an image.
Is there any additional software required for ComfyUI Hallo?
Yes, you need to have 'ffmpeg' installed for ComfyUI Hallo to work properly.
